info.description: This API provides access to the customer data of any CSS customer with myCSS / mySanagate access
info.title: CSS customer portal API

get.summary: Partner resource: get the current account settings information

400.description: Bad request due to decoding the data

412.description: Pre condition failed due to required data not found

404.description: Settings information for the current account not found

put.summary: Information resource: mark that lead to be read
Information resource: mark that lead to be read
Partner settings resource: modify document distribution

get.summary: Document resource: get a single document
get.description: Returns the requested Document (with a link to downlaod it as PDF).(ESEBDMSQuery readDokumentEB)
Says Hello World to everybody in Adele's style

post.description: Says hello to all names in DB

get.summary: Account resource: get already settled reimbursements (Leistungsabrechnungen)
Partners resource: get the logged in person with all details
get.description: Provides data like addresses or relations to other partner (ESEBBasisQuery initializePortalEB)

get.summary: Statistics about messages read und open matters

post.summary: Partner resource: add a new response to this matter
Partner resource: add a new rating(Bewertung) to this matter(Anliegen)
Partner resource: add a new question concerning assurance benefits to this matter
Partner resource: add a new question concerning assurance products to this matter

put.summary: Partner resource: mark all messages of this matter as read

post.summary: Partner resource: add a appointment proposal

put.summary: Information resource: mark that lead to be read

post.summary: ServiceProvider resource: post createria to search for service providers
post.description: to receive service provides machting the createria

get.summary: Partner resource: get a single partner with references to visible partners
get.description: Provides data like addresses or relations to other partners (entspricht ESEBBasisQuery searchPersonRollenEB)

post.summary: Product resource: createria to search for product descritpions
post.description: Returns product descriptions for the provided search criterieas.entspricht ESEBOAPQuery readProduktbezeichnungEB

get.summary: Offers resource: all offers of the logged in user
get.description: Finds the user's open offers or those of another person having granted access to this user. Offers are kept for three month if they are not otherwise deleted or transfered to a policy. (ESEBOAPQuery searchOfferteAntragOverviewEB)

get.summary: Offer resource: get a single offer
get.description: Returns the offer having the given id. The current user must have granted access to see this offer.(ESEBOAPQuery readOfferteAntragDetailEB)

get.summary: Policy resource: all policies for a partner
get.description: Finds the user's active policies or those of another person having granted access to this user. (ESEBOAPQuery readPoliceEB)

HelloWorld.description: Object which is converted from Java to JSON

lastname.description: lastname / firstname are not mandatory (business case: unborn child)

firstname.description: lastname / firstname are not mandatory (business case: unborn child)

allOf.description: Describes the person, who is logged in the portal system

LoggedInPerson.description: This is either RegisteredPerson or an UnregisteredPerson

lastname.description: lastname / firstname are not mandatory (business case: unborn child)

firstname.description: lastname / firstname are not mandatory (business case: unborn child)

maxResult.description: the found offerinfos will be limited to this maximum

offerinfos.description: The offerinfos found. If their amount if below maxResult, these are all offerinfos

OfferinfoResult.description: Listing of offerinfos, if maxResult is xyz, the amount of returned offerinfos is truncated to maxResult

allOf.description: Describes the person, who is logged in the portal system

dokumentNr.description: A unique print document number if the offer was printed out

DeactivateAccount.description: Object to provide reason for deactivation bundled with deactivation itself
